sentences.en: Claire had seen the taxi drawing away.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔看到出租车缓缓开走了。

sentences.en: Don't worry, your luggage will come on afterwards by taxi.
sentences.cn: 别担心，你的行李随后会由出租车送过来。

sentences.en: He had a taxi waiting to take him to the train.
sentences.cn: 他让一辆出租车等着带他到火车站去。

sentences.en: He pulls a rickshaw, probably the oldest form of human taxi service.
sentences.cn: 他拉黄包车，这可能是人类最古老的载客服务形式了。

sentences.en: He settled back in the rear of the taxi.
sentences.cn: 他靠坐在出租车的后排座上。

sentences.en: He was frustrated by his inability to wave down a taxi.
sentences.cn: 连一辆出租车都打不到，他很沮丧。

sentences.en: I strolled up and down thoughtfully before calling a taxi.
sentences.cn: 我踱来踱去仔细思量后叫了一辆出租车。

sentences.en: If you feel a taxi driver has overcharged you, say so.
sentences.cn: 如果你觉得出租车司机敲了你的竹杠，就说出来。

sentences.en: If you've got bags you're better off taking a taxi.
sentences.cn: 你要是大包小包的，不如打的算了。

sentences.en: Marlette was already out of the door, flagging down a taxi.
sentences.cn: 马利特已经出门了，正挥手招呼一辆出租车。

sentences.en: Rude taxi drivers clocked up a total of 239 offences in 1990.
sentences.cn: 1990年，出租车司机鲁莽驾驶导致的违章事件总共达239起。

sentences.en: The conversation was drowned by the arrival of the taxi.
sentences.cn: 到来的出租车的声音压过了谈话的声音。

sentences.en: The man led the way to the taxi rank.
sentences.cn: 那人带路来到了出租汽车候客处。

sentences.en: The plane taxied to a halt.
sentences.cn: 飞机滑行一段距离后停下来。

sentences.en: The taxi drew up in front of the Riviera Club.
sentences.cn: 出租车在里维埃拉俱乐部门口停了下来。

sentences.en: They sent me home in a taxi.
sentences.cn: 他们用出租车把我送回家。

a car and driver that you pay to take you somewhere
